author: Dana Hedgpeth
title: Live updates: Virus cases exceed 20,000 in D.C., Virginia and Maryland; 390,000 file for jobless assistance in four weeks - The Washington Post
description: Live updates: Virus cases exceed 20,000 in D.C., Virginia and Maryland; 390,000 file for jobless assistance in four weeks The Washington Post Virginia becomes latest state to see protests against coronavirus lockdown orders Fox News Coronavirus update: Case t…
content:
RICHMOND As acts of civil disobedience go, this was oddly pastoral: Gary Golden spread a blanket on the grassy lawn by Virginias Executive Mansion, opened a wicker picnic basket and offered strawberries to strangers.
As fellow protesters took him up on the o… [+935 chars]
